Articles.Content:
Hi i wanted to ask does any one know how to make Animation 3d using autodesk Maya,3d max or any other animating softwares.

I Like to hire someone to make animation video 1-2min long.

I will pay for work.

P.S.i have more work if you know how to use unity.

Skype renatsmc or pm me here on forum.

This is not the forum for such requests RenatsMC, you will be better off asking on an animation forum, as this is a game forum.

Good luck, but don't ask for this again here please.
